data.title: Nice Yin and Deep Stretch Yoga Classes
data.text: They have a 2 credits for $20 special and I took advantage of some down time during my visit to Winston-Salem to get some stretching classes in....the Yin class has you holding a stretching pose for 3 minutes which can make you go a little crazy but it does help you get more limber. The Deep Stretch class I took the following morning has shorter holds, focused more on breathing and listening to your body rather than holding for a certain amount of time. Marcia gave the Yin and Sue the Deep Stretch and I found both ladies to be extremely welcoming and helpful...I hate to be bullied especially in a yoga class because I am extremely stiff and have back spasm issues but these women genuinely wanted me to leave feeling better than I came in and took great care to ensure my comfort. Thank you!!!!
